bill.summary: 9/19/2012--Introduced. Reaffirms the importance of religion in the lives of U.S. citizens and their freedom to exercise those beliefs peacefully. Recognizes that Judeo-Christian heritage has played a strong role in the development of the United States and in the lives of many citizens. Rejects efforts to remove evidence of Judeo-Christian heritage and references to God from public structures and resources. Expresses support for preserving the freedom to exercise religious beliefs in the United States.
